extendedInfo.description: Have you struggled with diet plans in the past?  Are you looking for a diet plan solution that works?  My Diet Plan Match gives you a breakdown of more than 550 diet plans that are out there waiting to be tried.  From healthy diets, to weight loss diets, to low carb diets, to low fat diets; we cover every category of diet plan that exists.When adopting a diet plan, the single most critical factor in a dieters' success is adhering to a diet plan's food consumption guidelines.  My Diet Plan Match is unlike any other diet app out there because we allow you to explore a diet plan first, and then decide if it is right for you.  We do this by providing a diet plan overview, recommended foods, sample menu, and a complete recipe list for each and every diet plan.Better yet, My Diet Plan Match allows you to explore these different diet plans by selecting foods and recipes that you use often, and then returning lists of plans that include those foods and recipes.  We have over 2000 recipes, and 1500 foods in our database that are all tied into different diet plans. You''ll be surprised to find that some diet plans even include recipes for things such as dark chocolate truffles, and foods like pizza!  So whether you're a big fan of chicken Alfredo, cookies or peach crumble, we have a diet plan that is the perfect match for you!There is no doubt that knowing all you can about a diet plan will help you be successful with your diet goals in the long run, especially if you are not surprised by the diet foods and diet recipes you will have to eat when you select that plan!  Let My Diet Plan Match help you select a diet plan today that is in line with your eating habits and favorite foods!How Does it Work?Tap on the "Diet Plans That Include Your Favorite Foods" button, scroll through the foods, and then tap as many as you like to select them.  Tap them again to de-select.  Press "Go" and get a list of diet plan that include those food(s).  In the same way you can select the "Diet Plans That Include Your Favorite Recipes", and then select as many recipes as you like, tap "Go", and get a list of all diet plans that feature those recipe(s).Tap on the "Search Diet Plans" if you already know the name of a diet plan you want research and learn more about. Use the "Diet Categories" screen to learn more about the different diet plans that belong to categories like Low Carb, Detox, Low Fat, Low GI, and many more.   My Diet Plan Match:- 100% FREE - forever!- Takes the guesswork out of dieting.- 550+ diet plans from 12 different categories- Allows you to research diet plans by category like low GI, detox, fad, raw food and many more.- Allows you to select foods you like, and explore diet plans that include them.- Allows you to select recipes you like, and explore diet plans that include them.- Allows you to research diet plans by searching for a title of a diet plan that you already know of.- Provides a healthy recipe of the weekFeatured Categories of Diet Plans:Diet cookbooks, detox diets, diet delivery programs, fad diets, healthy diets, low carb diets, low fat diets, low GI diets, meal replacement diets, online diets, raw food diets, weight loss diets.Diet Plans we Feature:HCG, Atkins, South Beach, Diabetes, Liquid, Protein, 1200 Calorie, 1500 Calorie, 1400 Calorie, 800 Calorie, 400 Calorie, Kaiser, American Heart Association, AHA, gastritis, 3 day, 17 day, 2 day, 4 day, 11 day, 1000 calorie, chemical, British Heart Foundation, kidney, miracle, Bodybuilding, vegetarian, vegan, Body for Life, Cookie, Weight Watchers, Hacker's, Nutrisystems, Dukan, Beverly Hills, Cabbage Soup, Grapefruit, Junk food, Subway, Ketogenic, Gluten-free, Elimination, Alkaline, Blood Type, Dr. Hay, Feingold, Jenny Craig, Master Cleanse, Medifast, Mediterranean, Paleolithic, paleo, Acai Berry, Special K, diet2go, Jenny Craig, celebrity, zone, wedding, Scarsdale, lemonade, banana, montignac, slimming world, flat belly, slim down, abs, and MANY more.

reviews.title: I Found my Match!
reviews.comment: I had tried the South Beach and Atkins diets previously with limited to zero success.  This app helped me explore other diet plans, that I might have a better chance at success with.  The best part was I used my favorite foods to help isolate plans that would suit me best. It worked - I start my new diet plan tomorrow.
reviews.author: Sheharyar Nasir

reviews.title: Not as advertised
reviews.comment: I expected information and not just a list of books to read about it. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Sarah O

reviews.title: Lots of Great Recipes
reviews.comment: Downloaded this app hoping to get some information on a diet plan I had been considering going on - The 1500 Calorie Diet. I ended up playing around with it and found some awesome recipes from other diet plans that I will be trying out. 5 stars for being free and delivering more than I expected!
reviews.author: Abdul Rehman

reviews.title: Intrusive ads
reviews.comment: Was going to download this app but avg cauggt it having intrusive ads. What a shame that they allow their ads to take over!
reviews.author: Paula Morehead

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: Very disappointed. No free recipes available, it only advertises books...
reviews.author: Farrah Younes

reviews.title: not as described
reviews.comment: This is not what it says. Tells you about the books, had some recipes but you have to supply the ingredients. Not what I thought it would be at all.
reviews.author: Lisa Torbett

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and full of great information. There are so many diet plans to review, and the recipes are excellent!
reviews.author: BILAL ABBASI

reviews.title: Tons of great information
reviews.comment: My wife was looking for a diet, but wanted to still be able to eat certain foods; the app made it super easy to find a diet that suited her.
reviews.author: Daniel Legal

reviews.title: Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my phone. I cant open anything!! :-(
reviews.author: Eden Roode

reviews.title: Super cool diet plan app!
reviews.comment: Neat idea to allow users to research diet plans by selecting different foods and recipes.  I have always struggled with diets I have been on because I just love food too much.  This app suggested diet plans for me to try that would allow me to eat my favorite foods and cook my favorite recipes.  Cudos.
reviews.author: Jonathan Richards

reviews.title: Great Help for a Diabetic.
reviews.comment: I was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes 2 years ago, and I have had trouble finding foods and recipes that work for my diabetes.  This App had several excellent diabetic diet plans explained, complete with food breakdowns and recipes explained. Thanks for the free info!
reviews.author: Muhammad Ali

reviews.title: Very Useful Diet App
reviews.comment: Wow. I found some great recipes in this App. I have had problems with diet plans that promise so much, but when it comes down to what I can eat, I was always disappointed. This App allowed me to finally find a diet plan that fits into my eating habits. Thanks!
reviews.author: Ali Ahmed

reviews.title: Airpush adware
reviews.comment: Uses android adpush. Adware and might install 3rd party unwanted software
reviews.author: Len n

reviews.title: Not as it claims
reviews.comment: It shows no recipes,  just book summaries and diet protocols. Disappointing and simply a waste of time.
reviews.author: Marieanna Yurchenko
